---
theme: 
    projects.scss
listing:
    contents:
        - "gptc.qmd"
        - "gameAI.qmd"
        - "captioncraft.qmd"
    type: grid
    categories: true
    feed: true
    fields: [image, description, title]
---
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
  <style>
    .animate-me {
      width: 100px;
      height: 100px;
      background-color: palevioletred;
      margin: 50px auto;
    }
  </style>
  <script src="animate.js"></script>
</head>

<body>

<div class="gradient-text">
   <span style="font-size: 2.1rem; line-height: 1.8; font-family: 'Sans Serif';">
        Projects
    </span>
</div>


<div class="animate-me"></div>

<script>
  gsap.to(".animate-me", {
    duration: 10,
    x: 300,
    rotation: 360,
    backgroundColor: "#007bc2",
    borderRadius: "50%",
    ease: "bounce"
  });
</script>

</body>
